desc: Multiple contract jobs, 3 production-level open source projects. Also mentored someone from complete beginner level all the way to landing a full-time software developer job in Germany.
Led a team that helped dozens of overseas companies successfully obtain import licenses for food / recyclable materials from Chinese government authorities.

Oversaw and facilitated the selection, signing, localization, technical integration, and operational processes of the introduction of several Chinese online games into the European market, with the one title I was most closely involved having grossed over half a million USD.
